mapper.select: select * from MEMBER order by MEMBERNUM
mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER (MEMBERNUM, RANKNAME, DEPARTNAME, ID, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, BRITH, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, JOIN, PHOTO, SIGN, MEMSTATUS, ADMIN) values (MEMBER_SEQ.nextval, #{RANKNAME}, #{DEPARTNAME}, #{ID}, #{PASSWORD}, #{NAME}, #{EMAIL}, #{PHONE}, #{BIRTH}, #{ADDRESS1}, #{ADDRESS2}, #{JOIN}, #{PHOTO}, #{SIGN}, 0, 0)
